definition: ugly guy with a pretty girlfriend (slang)

sentences.english: Get a book of positive , inspirational thoughts and keep it by your desk or by your pillow. Read one or two passages each day.
sentences.chinese: 桌上或案头摆放着一本励志书，每天都去朗读一两段。

sentences.english: I have put some motivational and inspirational stuff in my blog.
sentences.chinese: 在侃英语的过程中我掺进了一些励志的东西。

sentences.english: You think it was the resolution of Goujian, the Yue king?
sentences.chinese: 你认为是越王勾践卧薪尝胆发奋励志？

sentences.english: Read words of inspiration. Find your favorite book that inspires you and open it to a random page.
sentences.chinese: 找到你最喜欢的励志书，翻开任意一页。

sentences.english: Salmond has built his career on being a motivational speaker.
sentences.chinese: 萨尔蒙德由一名励志演说家开始建立自己的职业生涯。

sentences.english: The captain returned to his club determined to lead them back to European glory.
sentences.chinese: 队长回到俱乐部，励志要率队重回欧洲之巅。

sentences.english: Perhaps the same is also true of self-help books.
Spiritual drama – or tendentious piece of Catholic proselytising?
sentences.chinese: 励志剧，或是宣传天主教的宗教片？

sentences.english: I listened to it, and it was probably the best motivational piece I ever heard.
sentences.chinese: 我听了，这也许是我听过的最好的励志录音。

sentences.english: Arnesen is a motivational speaker for corporations, schools, and non-profit organizations.
sentences.chinese: 阿内森是为企业，学校和非盈利组织励志演说家。

sentences.english: I motivate myself to play my best game by reading and listening to inspirational books/ audiobooks.
sentences.chinese: 我激励自己好好去读和听励志书籍或有声读物。

sentences.english: The School of Management has strived for excellence over the past two decades.
sentences.chinese: 二十年来，兰大管理学院立足西部，励志进取。

sentences.english: The theme song of Xiamen TV , 2008. It's very magnificent and heart-stirring .
sentences.chinese: 2008年厦门卫视主题曲，大气磅礴，励志动听。

sentences.english: " Armored steel fist" just finished robot boxing inspirational mission.
sentences.chinese: 《铁甲钢拳》就这样完成了机器人打拳击励志的使命。

sentences.english: Welcome all lovely kidults to come, to play and be inspired.
sentences.chinese: 各界可爱大顽童，欢迎前来玩物励志。

definition: ugly guy with a pretty girlfriend (slang)
to move to tears (of a story)/tear-provoking (gas)/lacrimogen
to stir up emotion/to arouse sympathy/moving
in touch with the common people/down-to-earth
the design of a character (in games, manga etc) (abbr. for 人物設定|人物设定)/(fig.) (a celebrity or other public figure's) image in the eyes of the public/public persona
